title: Which stream should I choose after +2 as I am good in maths and chemistry but weak in physics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well I am not a science student but I can help you in choosing a few field by giving you direction. If you are good at maths and chemistry here are the following profession you be successful in A degree in maths ( ba/ma)A degree in chemistry (bsc/MSC)Statistics honsEconomic honsFinancial engineeringEconometrics honsActuarial sciencesThe following courses have a greater value then traditional courses like btech and bcom and if successful you can earn in billions..

Firstly, don't believe on anyone! No one! Try and gather information about all the streams and know about the subjects, the sit down and think what you like, that is the most important and the only factor that matters. Go ahead and build your future! All the best!
